title: Trump celebrates Jimmy Kimmel suspension as some networks replace show with Charlie Kirk tribute – US politics live
summary: The indefinite removal of "Jimmy Kimmel Live!" has sparked public outrage, coinciding with a broader crackdown on commentary by the Trump administration. This surge in tensions follows the recent killing of conservative commentator Charlie Kirk. Critics argue that the show's removal reflects an alarming trend against free speech.

title: Screamers, treble and ‘let me talk’: Kevin De Bruyne’s memorable Etihad moments
summary: Manchester City legend prepares to return for a memorable match against his former team. Fans reminisce about unforgettable moments from his time at the club. The anticipation builds as the iconic player reconnects with his roots on the field.

title: Counties in dark over fate as Championship restructure vote is delayed
summary: The vote to restructure the County Championship has been postponed until the season's end. As a result, counties are uncertain about their objectives for the final two rounds. This delay adds confusion to the competition's conclusion.
